full_threads.body:
Sorry Heath!

Forgot to add if the form can be submitted to info@murrayzircon.com.au <mailto:info@murrayzircon.com.au> (same as the ‘contact us’) that would be great! 😊

Kind Regards,


Ms Alison Paley (she/her)
Murray Zircon Pty Ltd.
Executive Assistant

M 0423 880 870
E apaley@murrayzircon.com.au <mailto:apaley@murrayzircon.com.au>
W www.murrayzircon.com.au <http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/>




We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region.

IMPORTANT: The contents of this email and any attachments are confidential. They are intended for the named recipient(s) only. If you have received this email by mistake, please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to anyone or make copies thereof


From: Alison Paley
Sent: Tuesday, 31 May 2022 2:55 PM
To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: New Page for Murray Zircon: Speak Up

Hi Health!

Hope you’re well!

Its time for us to add another page to our website! This one will be called ‘Speak Up’ and we wish this to have access to two forms, one for a ‘Whistleblower’ and one for ‘Modern Slavery’… But as of right now, we’re only ready to have the ‘whistleblower’ form go live (I’m just trying to keep you in the loop about the modern slavery one!)

For the Whistleblower section, we’ll need you to include a link to our PDF whistleblower policy (I’m just waiting for that to be signed and will send through next couple of days)

The questions we need in the Whistleblower form are:
· Date, time and location
· Names of person(s) involved, roles and their department or business
· Your relationship with the person(s) involved
· The general nature of your concern
· How you became aware of the issue
· Possible witnesses; and
· Other information that you have to support your report.

Is this something that you’re able to assist with please?

Any issues or queries, please let me know! 😊

Kind Regards,


Ms Alison Paley (she/her)
Murray Zircon Pty Ltd.
Executive Assistant

M 0423 880 870
E apaley@murrayzircon.com.au <mailto:apaley@murrayzircon.com.au>
W www.murrayzircon.com.au <http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/>




We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region.
